scenarios.name: scenario 1
scenarios.description: Hi! I want to start my own garden. Can you send me a Hydroponic Root?
scenarios.wrongDescription: This isn't what I was looking for. Please send me a Hydroponic Root.

scenarios.name: scenario 2
scenarios.description: Root essence is meant to be great for the skin. Use the Extractor to get it from Hydroponic Root and send it to me.
scenarios.correctDescription: Thank you so much! This is exactly what I needed.
scenarios.wrongDescription: This isn't what I wanted. Please send me Root Essence.

scenarios.name: scenario 3
scenarios.description: Hi I need something to help grow my bacteria colony can you combined Hydroponic Root and [Fungi] to make a Biological Enhancer. That will help my lovelies grow
scenarios.correctDescription: Thanks, that is perfect! My bacteria colony is going to love this.
scenarios.wrongDescription: NO, I needed an Biological Enhancer! My bacteria colony is going to die!

scenarios.name: scenario 4
scenarios.description: I dropped by keys down the drain I need a magnet. Please could you make Ferrite Carbon by extracting [Pure Ferrite] from [Ferrite] Dust then combining with [Carbon Flakes]
scenarios.correctDescription: Yes! I can finally get my keys back. Thank you for the Ferrite Carbon.
scenarios.wrongDescription: This is not grabbing my keys. Please send me Ferrite Carbon.

scenarios.name: scenario 5
scenarios.description: I wanna smell good for a date. Synthesize Perfume using Ground Fungi and [Root] Essence
scenarios.correctDescription: Amazing! You've made Perfume. I smell great!
scenarios.wrongDescription: This isn't Perfume. Please try again.

scenarios.name: scenario 6 - same as one
scenarios.description: Hi it's me again! My plants aren't need something to grow on. Can you make Fertilising Paste from Fungi Essence and [Ground Root] and combine with Steel to build a [Hydroponic Tower]
scenarios.correctDescription: Thank you! This is perfect. My plants will be as tall as trees in no time.
scenarios.wrongDescription: That's not Fertilising Paste. My plants are going to die!

scenarios.name: scenario 7
scenarios.description: My kid has asthma can you make her an inhaler. [Grind] then heat fungi and combine with an Oxygen Booster made with [Ferrite] Carbon and [Biological] Enhancer to create an Inhaler
scenarios.correctDescription: Oh my goodness! You've made an Inhaler. This should help my daughter breathe.
scenarios.wrongDescription: She is really struggling to breathe. Please send me an Inhaler.

scenarios.name: scenario 8
scenarios.description: The support system on my ship is failing. Combine [Carbon] Steel and [Oxygen] Booster to create [Life Support]
scenarios.correctDescription: Amazing! My ship is saved. Thank you for the Life Support.
scenarios.wrongDescription: Cmon buddy my ship is falling apart. Help me

scenarios.name: scenario 9
scenarios.description: The inhaler only worked well for a while a medicinal one is needed!. Combined Activated Fungi and a Bio [Enhancer] to get [healing] herb activate it and combine with an Inhaler to create a Medicinal Inhaler
scenarios.correctDescription: That should work for the long term. You are a true hero

scenarios.name: Lord Kelvin
scenarios.description: Hey it's Lord Kelvin. A fish species on my planet is dying out due to an infection caused by fishing - I used to do a lot of fishing but it's spreading the infection and I feel bad for the fishes. To save the fish can you make me an injector by joining a [carbon] sheet with a [ground] healing herb. The fish need your help!
scenarios.correctDescription: Nice work! The Injector fish are saved. - lord kelvin fan club is very cool :)
scenarios.wrongDescription: That's not an Injector Student. You do not deserve a place at galactic renowned Glasgow University - the most prestigious university in the galaxy .
